author: _shemnon
content: Is all the assembly code hand generated or is there a piece of software that did that?  It's awesome.

author: oripomerantz
content: Thank you *blush*. I wrote an EOF generator (https://github.com/ethereum/tests/blob/f570053a1fed33a30aa0d528969725ac38333384/src/Templates/EOF1/EOF1-generator.js), but I prefer to hand write using the new EOF test format because that produces clearer tests when properly commented.
